knownrelatives: Super-Adaptoid (original design/creator), Adaptoids (fellow Adaptoids), Super-Adaptoid II (Yelena Belova) (fellow Adaptoid), Adaptoid (New Enforcers) (fellow Adaptoid), Paragon (fellow Adaptoid), Ultra-Adaptoid (fellow Adaptoid), A.I.M. (creator)
powers: Duplicate the abilities and weapons of any being it has encountered, powers/abilities it has copied are those of: Captain America, Psi-Lord, Vibraxas, Devlor, Huntara
